articles.author: Matt Somerfield
articles.title: Saudi Arabian GP: The latest F1 tech updates direct from the pitlane - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Join us as we delve into the Formula 1 technical features on display in the pitlane as teams prepare for the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix, courtesy of Giorgio Piola and Sutton Images.
articles.content:
In the past, we might have seen F1 teams arrive in Saudi Arabia with a bespoke rear wing solution to reduce downforce and drag.
However, the cost cap and resource restrictions have resulted in every… [+4397 chars]
